name: celery_project
description: A Simple Django Project to illustrate the use of Celery

scripts.setup_test_db: psql -c "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS test_postgres_database" && psql -c "DROP USER IF EXISTS test_postgres_user" && psql -c "CREATE USER test_postgres_user PASSWORD 'testDB-password'" && psql -c "CREATE DATABASE test_postgres_database OWNER test_postgres_user" && psql -c "GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE test_postgres_database to test_postgres_user"  && psql -c "ALTER ROLE test_postgres_user SUPERUSER"
scripts.test: export ENV_PATH=.envs/.test.env && npm run setup_test_db && pytest
scripts.dev:celery: export ENV_PATH=.envs/.dev.env && concurrently --raw --kill-others "./manage.py runserver_plus" "gulp" "maildev -o" "celery -A config worker -l info -E -B"

author: Victor Miti <victormiti@umusebo.com>
